name: Mosquito (itch) (CrazyColibri)
description:
Hello everyone !!

We are happy to introduce you our game for this Ludum Dare 46 : Mosquito !

In this reflex game, you'll have to save the mosquito's life while he's draining the largest amont of blood : 

-let him drain the largest amont of blood
-CLICK on another part of the arm when you see a hand coming to you
-when you have drained enough blood, change your human target, CLICK on the button at the bottom of the screen
-everytime you change your target arm, blood fills faster but the difficulty increase
-continue until the bloody jauge is filled

ENJOY :)
